blocked.title: Access Restricted
blocked.message: Access to hromada is not available from your location.
blocked.reason: To protect Ukrainian infrastructure data and prevent potential security threats, access from certain regions is restricted. This platform contains information about critical infrastructure projects in Ukraine.
blocked.vpnMessage: If you believe this is an error and you are not accessing from a restricted location, please disable any VPN or proxy services and try again. If you continue to experience issues, please contact us.

submitProject.title: Submit Your Infrastructure Project
submitProject.subtitle: Register your project to connect with donors supporting sustainable infrastructure in Ukraine.
submitProject.description: This form is for municipal officials to submit infrastructure projects that need donor support. Projects are reviewed by our team before being published.
submitProject.allFieldsRequired: All fields marked with * are required
formInstructions: This form is for municipal officials to submit infrastructure projects that need donor support.
Projects are reviewed by our team before being published on the platform.
All fields marked with * are required.
For security reasons, we only display city-level locations on the map - never exact facility addresses.
submitProject.optionalFieldsNote: These fields are optional but help donors understand the project scope.
submitProject.securityNote: For security, we only show city-level locations on the map - never exact facility addresses.

about.title: About hromada
about.mission: hromada, "community" in Ukrainian, connects municipalities with donors to rebuild critical infrastructure, focusing on renewable energy and sustainability.
about.statementOfPurposeText: Our goal is to restore the flow of support for the sustainable reconstruction of Ukrainian infrastructure in the wake of the cessation of aid by the United States government. This platform serves as a transparent bridge between Ukrainian municipalities seeking support for renewable energy and infrastructure projects, and donors who want to make a direct, meaningful impact. The ultimate purpose is the decentralization of Ukraine's power grids and the building of sustainable resilience against Russian attacks on critical infrastructure.
about.howItWorksText: Municipalities submit infrastructure projects that need funding. We verify each submission and connect them with donors and 501(c)(3) organizations who can provide support.
about.forMunicipalitiesText: Community leaders submit their infrastructure projects through our platform. Each project is reviewed before being published.
about.forDonorsText: Browse verified projects, filter by category, urgency, or location, and connect directly with communities to provide support.
about.directConnectionText: We process donations and transfer funds directly to the recipient municipality. You always know exactly which project your contribution supports.
about.categoryIntro: We fund solar PVs, battery storage, heat pumps, and thermo-modernization for:
about.contactText: Questions or feedback? Reach out to us at

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions about the hromada platform? We're here to help.
contact.generalInquiriesText: For general questions about the platform, partnership opportunities, or other inquiries, please contact us at
contact.forMunicipalitiesText: If you're a Ukrainian municipality looking to submit a project, please use the "Submit a Project" button in the header.
contact.forDonorsText: Browse our projects and use the contact form on each project page to express your interest in supporting a specific municipality.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.intro: We take trust seriously. Every project on hromada goes through a verification process to ensure authenticity and protect both donors and municipalities.
transparency.verificationText: Each project submission is reviewed by our team before being published. We verify the municipality's identity, confirm the project details, and ensure the information is accurate.
transparency.directConnectionText: We process donations and transfer funds directly to the recipient municipality. Full transparency means you always know exactly which project and community your contribution supports.
transparency.partnersText: We work with trusted NGOs and organizations on the ground in Ukraine who help verify projects and facilitate connections between donors and communities.
